problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the four vertices A, B, C, and D are all on ⊙O, if ∠COD = N_0, then ∠ABD + ∠OCA is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接CD,∵∠ABD与∠ACD是同弧所对的圆周角,∴∠ACD=∠ABD,∴∠ABD+∠OCA=∠OCD,在等腰△OCD中,∵∠COD=80°,∴∠OCD=\frac{180°-∠COD}{2}=\frac{180°-80°}{2}=50°,即∠ABD+∠OCA=50°．故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查的是圆周角定理及等腰三角形的性质,根据题意作出辅助线,构造出圆周角是解答此题的关键．
